name: MusicLawContracts.com
overview:
MusicLawContracts.com was launched in October 2012 as a solution to help musicians, and music business professionals from all over the World find trusted and up-to-date music contracts that protect them and their music.

For years, artists and music professionals have had to rely on using outdated low-quality music contracts, often written for a territory different to their own (and thus based on different legislation). Alternatively, you can pay hundreds in legal fees to have a custom contract written up. We work with some of the music industry’s top music law lawyers to create contracts that you can trust.

MusicLawContracts.com is a partnership between The Musician’s Guide, a trusted music business resource used by hundreds of thousands of artists, and Avenant Law, one of the fastest growing music and media law firms. Together, the partnership supplies professional music contracts to over 500 record labels and music companies.
